::: {.cell}

:::

::: {.cell}

:::


The current valid map is identified by **Map code and version**: SF2.2.web.orig v1.0.


> Point records of flooded mines were compiled from public databases (https://www.unexmin.eu/the-european-inventory-of-flooded-mines-is-now-online/), an internet search for "flooded mines" and locations of deep mines inferred from world mineral resources spatial data (USGS: https://mrdata.usgs.gov/). Terrestrial ecoregions (Dinerstein et al. 2017) with concentrations of these records were selected to represent an indicative global distribution of flooded mines at 30 arc seconds spatial resolution..

::: {.cell}

:::


You can download and use this file from the following sources:

- GitHub repository ([GeoJSON / TopoJSON versions in GitHUB](https://github.com/red-list-ecosystem/typology-map-data/blob/master/data/layers/SF2.2.web.orig_v1.0_topo.json))
 - Zenodo repository (EFG map) ([Includes GeoTIFF, GeoJSON and PNG files](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5091050))
 - Zenodo repository (bundle of maps) ([Includes GeoTIFF, GeoJSON and PNG versions in compressed file](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090419))

::: {.cell}

:::

This section provides information about the valid indicative distribution map for the ecosystem functional group [**SF2.2 Flooded mines and other voids**](/efg-info/SF2_2.qmd).


::: {.cell}

:::

## Available maps

These maps are considered current and valid indicative distribution maps for this ecosystem functional group.

- Indicative Map (**code: SF2.2.IM.orig**, version v1.0) 
 - Web navigation (**code: SF2.2.web.orig**, version v1.0) 

## Map files

You can download geospatial data for this map from the following sources:

SF2.2.IM.orig (v1.0){target="gisdata"}: [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/SF2.2.IM.orig_v1.0.tif) :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3958934)
SF2.2.web.orig (v1.0){target="gisdata"}: [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/SF2.2.web.orig_v1.0.tif) :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090419) :: [Zenodo repository (EFG map)](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5091050) :: [GitHub repository](https://github.com/red-list-ecosystem/typology-map-data/blob/master/data/layers/SF2.2.web.orig_v1.0_topo.json) :: [GitHub repository](layers/SF2.2.web.orig_v1.0_topo.json) :: [Earth Engine assets](projects/earthengine-legacy/assets/users/jrferrerparis/IUCN-GET/L3_IndMaps/) :: [GitHub repository](SF2.2.web.orig_v1.0_topo.json)

Note that you need to login to some services like [mapbox](https://www.mapbox.com){target="links"} or [earthengine](https://earthengine.google.com){target="links"}, and in some cases you also need to request access to the files.
